abstract: Al Gore says Web 2.0 needs a higher purpose than idle chatter: fighting global warming.
snippet: Al Gore says Web 2.0 needs a higher purpose than idle chatter: fighting global warming.
lead_paragraph: Forget about swapping party pictures on Facebook and other “gee-whiz stuff,” says former Vice President Al Gore. “Web 2.0 has to have a purpose.”

headline.main: Al Gore and the Purpose-Driven Web
